name: Escape with AI
description:
To play in the browser go to this link:

https://simmer.io/@LemonDev/escape-with-ai

Wait some time to load the game and click on fullscreen 

(I uploaded the WebGL version to a different website because I couldn't upload it before the deadline. It's the same game that was made in  3 days. I didn't update it. So I don't think this is considered a cheat)

Your spaceship crashed into an unknown planet. Your robot AI got damaged due to the crash. You need to fix him. He is the only one that can do the calculation for the spaceship. Fix him and escape the planet...

Made for Wowie Game-Jam 4.0

How to play

Press ADWS keys to move

Left mouse click to shoot

Press E to interact with objects

Music from Wowie Resource Pack:

https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

Font: https://www.dafont.com/codeman38.d695
